question: Using 4 kWh of power is equivalent to using 2000 W of power for 2 h.

Doubling the voltage across a resistor will cut the current by half.

The value of a resistor is in direct proportion to its power handling capabilities.
Heat produced by a resistor is generally a desirable effect.
